creator: Hantec Markets Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The right opportunity to trade can arise anytime, anywhere.

That’s why we created the Hantec Markets trading app, so that you can have the flexibility you need to trade on the go. Join a community of traders on the Hantec Markets trading app, and discover an all-new trading experience/

- Simply tap to trade, deposit or withdraw
- Supercharge your market insights with real-time charting and tools
- Set and receive price alerts to stay ahead of the markets
- Seamlessly monitor your trading performance on the go

The Hantec Markets trading app puts the power to trade in your hands. Seize market opportunities when they strike, and trade with Hantec Markets whenever you want, wherever you are.

- Trade all our products with competitive spreads and low fees
Global markets, seamless trading, easy deposits & withdrawals, and competitively low costs.

- Monitor your trading history
Keep an eye on your positions and orders, and track how your trades have performed over time.

- Analyse markets with our advanced charting tools
Gain real-time insights on how prices are moving with comprehensive charts, a customisable watchlist, an updating economic calendar and more.

- Set and receive price alerts
No need to constantly monitor the charts - set up price alerts and be notified instantly when the markets are trading at your desired price.

- Make deposits and withdraw funds
Running low on your trading balance, or want to take home your earnings? Easily deposit in or withdraw from your account.

- 24/5 customer support
Our customer support team is readily available to assist you via live chat, email or phone.

- Manage your account on the go
Control your account with convenience, and access all the benefits of trading with Hantec Markets right at your fingertips!

It's EXCEPTIONAL TRADING POWER, now in your hands! After all, trading opportunities never wait - why should you?

Take advantage of market opportunities when they strike. Trade with Hantec Markets trading app - download today!

ABOUT HANTEC MARKETS

Hantec Markets offers leveraged trading on currencies, gold, stocks and more, with access to various tools, the Hantec Social copy trading app, standard and cent accounts, and its latest Hantec Markets mobile app.

With 33 years of group experience and having been named the ‘Most Transparent Broker – Global’ at the 2023 Global Forex Awards, the company aims to provide trading services that clients can trust, offering an unmatched experience to traders across the world.

The Hantec brand is regulated across the world, including Australia, Japan, Hong Kong, and Mauritius.

Disclaimer:
Hantec Markets provides access to a range of trading products, including complex derivative products that are traded on margin. Leveraged trading carries a high level of risk to your capital and is not suitable for all investors, as there is the possibility of losing money rapidly and incurring losses that greatly exceed your investments.
descriptionShort: Trade global markets with the Hantec Markets app - FX, stocks, gold and more.
title:
